rooms.name: Open-plan Kitchen and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious open area combining the kitchen and living area, featuring traditional Kerala-style architecture with wood accents, stone finishes and natural light flooding in from Vastu-compliant windows.

details.lighting: Natural light with overhead ambient lighting

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A large master bedroom designed with Kerala-style decor, incorporating Vastu principles for positive energy flow. Includes built-in storage and a balcony overlooking the garden.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom with traditional finishes and a private balcony, following Vastu guidelines for energy flow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A traditional Kerala-style bedroom with space for a small study area, ensuring harmonious Vastu energy.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated space for entertainment featuring traditional Kerala-style design and modern acoustics, adhering to Vastu principles with strategic placement relative to other rooms.

rooms.name: Utility Room and Bathroom
rooms.description: A combined utility area and bathroom designed for convenience, with a Kerala-inspired look. Features include water storage, washing facilities and Vastu-aligned positioning.

openings.description: Large windows placed in the living area and bedrooms, aligned with Vastu principles to maximize natural light and ventilation.
Sturdy wood doors on all rooms ensuring privacy while allowing ease of access between open-plan spaces.

additional_features.name: Large Garden
additional_features.description: A spacious garden designed around the penthouse, incorporating traditional Kerala landscaping elements such as a water feature and native flora to enhance serenity.

additional_features.name: Outdoor Patio
additional_features.description: An outdoor patio area adjacent to the living area for relaxing or hosting guests.
